00030 #ifndef RANDOMNUMBERGENERATORS_HPP_
00031 #define RANDOMNUMBERGENERATORS_HPP_
00032 
00033 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00034 #include <boost/serialization/split_member.hpp>
00035 
00040 class RandomNumberGenerator
00041 {
00042 private:
00043 
00045     int mSeed;
00046 
00048     long unsigned mTimesCalled;
00049 
00051     static RandomNumberGenerator* mpInstance;
00052 
00054     double mWorkingMem1;
00056     double mWorkingMem2;
00058     double mWorkingMemW;
00060     double mRandNum2;
00062     bool mUseLastNum;
00063 
00064     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00076     template<class Archive>
00077     void save(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version) const
00078     {
00079         // note, version is always the latest when saving
00080         archive & mSeed;
00081         archive & mTimesCalled;
00082         archive & mUseLastNum;
00083         archive & mRandNum2;
00084     }
00085 
00097     template<class Archive>
00098     void load(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00099     {
00100         archive & mSeed;
00101         archive & mTimesCalled;
00102         archive & mUseLastNum;
00103         archive & mRandNum2;
00104         // reset the random number generator to use the correct seed
00105         srandom(mSeed);
00106         // call it the correct number of times to put it in the
00107         // same state as it used to be.
00108         // NOTE: This is only guaranteed to work if Normal random
00109         // deviates are not used, since the methods to generate
00110         // numbers from a normal distribution use static variables.
00111         for (long unsigned i=0; i<mTimesCalled; i++)
00112         {
00113             random();
00114         }
00115     }
00116     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SPLIT_MEMBER()
00117 
00118 protected:
00119 
00124     RandomNumberGenerator();
00125 
00126 public:
00127 
00128 
00138     double StandardNormalRandomDeviate();
00139 
00147     double NormalRandomDeviate(double mean, double sd);
00148 
00152     double ranf();
00153 
00160     unsigned randMod(unsigned base);
00161 
00171     void Shuffle(unsigned num, std::vector<unsigned>& rValues);
00172 
00177     static RandomNumberGenerator* Instance();
00178 
00185     static void Destroy();
00186 
00192     void Reseed(int seed);
00193 
00194 
00195 };
00196 #endif /*RANDOMNUMBERGENERATORS_HPP_*/
